title: Trevor Unveils "The Donald J. Trump Presidential Twitter Library" Book | Andrea Mitchell
itunes:title: Trevor Unveils "The Donald J. Trump Presidential Twitter Library" Book | Andrea Mitchell
description:
Rudy Giuliani smears Michael Cohen on cable news, Trevor announces "The Donald J. Trump Presidential Twitter Library" book, and MSNBC anchor Andrea Mitchell stops by.
